title: What features does the version 1 have ?

blocks.title: Fitness Coach/Diet Coach
blocks.description: Personalized workouts, Exercise routines, Training tips, Nutritional advice, Meal planning, Balanced diet recommendations

blocks.title: Daily Progress Tracking
blocks.description: Weight monitoring, Workout log, Food diary, Progress reports

blocks.title: Auto Adjustment of Plans
blocks.description: Adaptive fitness plans, Smart goal setting, Customized diet adjustments, Automated plan optimization, Real-time feedback
